fields.label: Task ID
fields.description: The task ID of the completed bulk verification

fields.label: Email List (Matching Submitted Emails)
fields.description:
Paste the list of emails associated with the Task ID. Enter one email per line. Do not use commas or spaces. For example:
dev@bounceban.com
support@bounceban.com

fields.label: Limit
fields.description: Number of results to retrieve (1-10000, default: 1000)

fields.label: BounceBan API Key
fields.description: Select your connected BounceBan API key. You can find your API key at https://bounceban.com/app/api/settings
